content.title: GLASS Classification
content.definition: Global Limb Anatomic Staging System grades infrainguinal disease severity to predict outcomes of revascularization.
content.statement: GLASS Classification is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding GLASS Classification helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.

explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of GLASS Classification.
